text: Bernhardsthal is a municipality in Mistelbach in the Austrian state of Lower Austria. The Lake Bernhardsthal is in the municipality. The municipality has three villages (population):Statistik Austria, as recorded 31 October 2011 * Bernhardsthal (819) * Katzelsdorf (370) * Reintal (410) == Population == == References == == Other websites == * Category:Settlements in Mistelbach District
title: Bernhardsthal
